              .

speaker: CAESAR
text:
Good
               
              Antony
              ,
               
              your
               
              hand
              .

speaker: POMPEY
text:
I’ll
               
              try
               
              you
               
              on
               
              the
               
              shore
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
And
               
              shall
              ,
               
              sir
              .
               
              Give
               
              ’s
               
              your
               
              hand
              .

speaker: POMPEY
text:
O
              ,
               
              Antony
              ,
               
              you
               
              have
               
              my
               
              father’s
               
              house
              .

speaker: POMPEY
text:
But
               
              what
              ?
               
              We
               
              are
               
              friends
              !
               
              Come
               
              down
               
              into
               
              the
               
              boat
              .

speaker: ENOBARBUS
text:
Take
               
              heed
               
              you
               
              fall
               
              not
              .

speaker: ENOBARBUS
text:
Menas
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              not
               
              on
               
              shore
              .

speaker: MENAS
text:
No
              ,
               
              to
               
              my
               
              cabin
              .
               
              These
               
              drums
              ,
               
              these
               
              trumpets
              ,
               
              flutes
              !
               
              What
              !

speaker: MENAS
text:
Let
               
              Neptune
               
              hear
               
              we
               
              bid
               
              a
               
              loud
               
              farewell

speaker: MENAS
text:
To
               
              these
               
              great
               
              fellows
              .
               
              Sound
               
              and
               
              be
               
              hanged
              .
               
              Sound
               
              out
              !

speaker: ENOBARBUS
text:
Hoo
              ,
               
              says
               
              ’a
              !
               
              There’s
               
              my
               
              cap
              !

speaker: MENAS
text:
Hoo
              !
               
              Noble
               
              captain
              ,
               
              come
              .
